name: Saving Sam - Septic Sam Edition
description:
--Saving Septic Sam--

Septic Sams septic tank isn't looking so great, don't let the Sam's fall into the abyss!

-How To Play-
Tap Septic Sam to begin and keep tapping the Sam's to build your high score up. Save all of the Sams!



Disclaimer:

reference to any celebrity, artist, musician, person, product, name, trademark, service mark, or company name is for descriptive purposes and does not imply sponsorship, endorsement, or recommendation unless explicitly stated herein.

Overall thanks to YouTuber JackSepticEye for complete inspiration :)
